meanings.sent1: After drinking too much, he inebriated himself at the party.
meanings.sent2: She inebriated herself with several glasses of wine.
meanings.sent3: The bartender inebriated the customer with strong cocktails.
meanings.sent4: The music inebriated her senses, making her feel light-headed.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked bread inebriated him with nostalgia.

meanings.sent1: The inebriated man stumbled out of the bar.
meanings.sent2: She felt inebriated after celebrating her birthday with friends.
meanings.sent3: The inebriated squirrel stumbled around the park after eating fermented fruit.
meanings.sent4: The inebriated laughter filled the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The inebriated colors of the sunset painted the sky in a mesmerizing display.
